meanings.definition: A small plastic card with a magnetic strip or embedded microchip used to gain access to a building or room.
meanings.sent1: I used my keycards to enter the office building.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to keep your keycards safe to enter the hotel room.
meanings.sent3: The keycards decided to take a break and refused to open the door.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a set of keycards, unlocking the hearts of everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The keycards jingled in his pocket, a reminder of the places he could explore.

meanings.definition: A card used to activate or operate a machine or device by inserting or swiping it.
meanings.sent1: Insert the keycards to start the vending machine.
meanings.sent2: The technician swiped the keycards to access the control panel.
meanings.sent3: The keycards played a game of hide and seek with the ATM, refusing to work.
meanings.sent4: His words were like keycards, unlocking the secrets of the ancient machine.
meanings.sent5: The keycards slid smoothly into the slot, activating the security system.
